overview:
Paul oversaw the meteoric rise of Whitehill Technologies, now part of Skywire Software, as Vice President of Finance and Administration. He contributed strongly to Whitehill’s growth from a start-up to the 5th largest private software company in Canada and was instrumental in sourcing and structuring the company’s successful financing relationships and an acquisition transaction in 2006.

Paul has also taken an interest in developing new companies in Atlantic Canada including a new research venture, Bio Prosepcting NB, that is developing pain relief drugs and cancer disrupting pharmaceuticals.
